qas.question: What has been more prominently reported in recent years in Saint Helena?
Who has been accused of lying about the child abuse issue of Saint Helena?
Who has Britain’s Foreign and Commonwealth Office been accused of lying to about child abuse?

context: In recent years[when?], there have been <a0_0>reports of child abuse<a0_0/> in St Helena. <a1_0>Britain’s Foreign and Commonwealth Office<a1_0/> (FCO) has been accused of lying to <a2_0>the United Nations<a2_0/> about child abuse in St Helena to cover up allegations, including cases of a police officer having raped a four-year-old girl and of a police officer having mutilated a two-year-old.
